name: Sonic Screwdriver
desc: This metal device measures about 8 inches long and weighs 1 pound. You can use an action, pointing it at an object within 120 feet of you that can be opened, such as a door, lid, or lock. The screwdriver issues a sonic tone, and one lock or latch on the object opens unless the sound can't reach the object. If no locks or latches remain, the object itself opens.
